actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To amend title 37, United States Code, United States Code, to lower the threshold required for the Secretary of Defense to make a temporary adjustment to a rate of the basic allowance for housing for members of the uniformed services, and to make permanent the authority to make such adjustment.
